instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01598 no power
threads.message:
Hey, first it came in no power, no sign of h20 or burn, i looked and 
PPBUS_G3H = 0.3v and find problem with speaker amp. now i got 

PPBUS_G3H = 12.3V
PP3v3_G3H = 3.3V
PP5V_G3S = 11.5V

seems like pp5vg3s got some problem, where to look and what next

threads.title: 820-01598 no power
threads.message:
Check diode mode to ground on the T2 lines connected to that chip.
Like SPKRAMP_RESET_L, SPKRAMP_INT_L, etc...

threads.title: 820-01598 no power
threads.message:
SPKRAMP_RESET_L diode mode to g 0.007v
SPKRAMP_INT_L diode mode to g 0.032v

threads.title: 820-01598 no power
threads.message:
So T2 internal damage.
Classic problem, when found corrosion underneath speaker amps; PPBUS_G3H connected there too.

threads.title: 820-01598 no power
threads.message: Now i got 5v and 300mah but no 20v
